title: nI daya galgunO
sahitya:
nI daya eTula galgunO rAma nIraja lOcana nirupama suguNa


anupallavi

  Adaramuga nI pAdamu nammina sAdhulavalE bhava pAda lEka yuNDuTaku


caraNam 1    mandaradhara gOvinda nIvE gati muddu venaka tOcaka ninnu nammiti 
kundaradana sharadindu nibhAnana sindu shayana sura brnda vandita nApai
    caraNam 2    sAmaja vadani nEmani pogaDudu kAma janaka nAkenduku nirdaya 
shrI manOhari kanakAmbara giridhara shyAma sundara suguNAkara nAmIDa
    caraNam 3    dAsa janula paritApamu lellanu vEsaraga dIrccEvADunIvEgada 
vAsudEva jagadIsha janArdhana bhAsura maNimaya bhUSa manjuLa bhASa
